s2.title: CreateDOMDocument
s2.p: CreateDOMDocument, illustrates how you can create a DOM tree in memory from scratch. It then reports the elements in the tree that was just created.

s3.title: Building on Windows
s3.p: Load the &XercesCInstallDir;-win32\samples\Projects\Win32\VC6\samples.dsw Microsoft Visual C++ workspace inside your MSVC IDE. Then build the project marked CreateDOMDocument.
